vulnerabilities.name: SQL Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Potential SQL injection vulnerability due to unvalidated user input
vulnerabilities.remediation: Use parameterized queries or an ORM to prevent SQL injection

vulnerabilities.name: Insecure Dependency
vulnerabilities.remediation: Update express to version 4.17.3 or later

vulnerabilities.name: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
vulnerabilities.description: Potential XSS vulnerability in user output
vulnerabilities.remediation: Use content security policy and escape user input

vulnerabilities.name: Information Exposure
vulnerabilities.description: Verbose error messages could expose sensitive information
